FiApplicationListPage.title: Funding Applications
FiApplicationListPage.description: Review all applications submitted by farmers and cooperatives.
FiApplicationListPage.noApplications: No applications found in this category.

toast.updateSuccessDescription: Application status has been updated to {{status}}.

FiProductCreatePage.title: Create Financial Product
FiProductCreatePage.description: Define a new loan or grant product to be offered to farmers.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the product, its benefits, and who is eligible.
form.targetRolesDescription: Select the roles eligible for this product.

toast.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in as a Financial Institution.

FiProductsPage.title: Financial Products
FiProductsPage.description: View and manage your loan and grant products.
FiProductsPage.noProducts: You have not created any financial products yet.

InsurancePage.title: Agricultural Insurance
InsurancePage.description: Protect your farm and assets against unforeseen risks.
InsurancePage.noProducts: No insurance products are currently available.

InsuranceApplyPage.title: Apply for Insurance
InsuranceApplyPage.description: Apply for coverage for your farm with {{productName}}.

form.noFarms: No farms found. Please create one first.
form.coverageValueDescription: Enter the total value of the assets you wish to insure.

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.description: Your insurance application has been sent for review.

toast.successDescription: Your insurance application has been sent to the provider.

InsuranceProductCreatePage.title: Create Insurance Product
InsuranceProductCreatePage.description: Define a new insurance policy to be offered on the platform.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the product and its benefits.

toast.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in as an Insurance Provider.
toast.successDescription: The insurance product '{{name}}' was created successfully.

InsuranceProductsPage.title: Insurance Products
InsuranceProductsPage.description: View and manage your insurance products.
InsuranceProductsPage.noProducts: You have not created any insurance products yet.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the agricultural world, from seed to table.

hero.title: Rebuilding Global Food Supply Chains with {appName}
hero.subtitle: Connecting farmers, buyers, and every stakeholder in between with transparency, technology, and trust.

features.title: A Unified Platform for a Connected Supply Chain
features.subtitle: DamDoh brings every aspect of the agricultural value chain into a single, intelligent ecosystem.

networking.title: Professional Network
networking.description: Connect directly with farmers, exporters, financiers, and service providers from around the world.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment with confidence, backed by verifiable data.

forums.title: Knowledge Forums
forums.description: Share insights, ask questions, and collaborate with a global community of agricultural experts.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Find or offer specialized agricultural services, from agronomy consulting to logistics.

forWho.title: Empowering Every Link in the Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is built for the entire agricultural ecosystem. Whether you're tending a small plot or managing international trade, our platform provides the tools you need to succeed.
forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural professionals collaborating.

farmers.title: Farmers & Cooperatives
farmers.description: Access new markets, secure financing, and utilize best practices to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Exporters
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and streamline your supply chain.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more efficient and sustainable food system.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Agri-Business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of stakeholders who are building a more transparent and prosperous agricultural future.

RegulatorDashboard.title: Regulator Dashboard
RegulatorDashboard.noComplianceAlerts: No compliance alerts at this time.

tooltip.onlinePending: {count, plural, one {# change pending sync.} other {# changes pending sync.}}
tooltip.offline: Offline: {count, plural, one {# change saved locally.} other {# changes saved locally.}}

offline.title: Connection Lost
offline.description: You are now offline. Changes will be saved locally.

syncing.title: Syncing Data
syncing.description: Attempting to sync {count, plural, one {# pending change} other {# pending changes}} with the server.

synced.title: Sync Complete!
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync offline changes. Will retry later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: Your change has been saved locally and will be synced when you are online.

notificationsPage.title: Notifications
notificationsPage.description: Here are your latest updates and alerts.

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Discover agricultural experts and professional services to help your business grow.
talentExchangePage.searchPlaceholder: Search skills or services (e.g., Soil Testing)
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later for new listings.

searchPage.title: Universal Search
searchPage.description: Find anything across the DamDoh platform, from people to products.
searchPage.placeholder: Search for products, services, people, or even a VTI...

modal.title: Universal Search
modal.searchErrorDescription: An error occurred while performing the search. Please try again.
modal.invalidCodeError: Invalid QR code. This is not a valid DamDoh user or batch code.
modal.scanErrorDescription: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.
modal.userNotFound: User not found for the scanned ID.

sustainabilityPage.title: Sustainability Dashboard
sustainabilityPage.description: Track and understand your farm's environmental impact.

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: Please sign in to view your sustainability dashboard.

noData.title: No Data Available
noData.description: We don't have enough data to generate your sustainability report yet. Start logging your farm activities!
